The_DT final_JJ decision_NN is_VBZ based_VBN on_IN decisions_NNS of_IN all_DT base_NN classifiers_NNS ._.

The_DT simplest_JJS approach_NN is_VBZ bagging_VBG -LRB-_-LRB- bootstrap_JJ aggregating_NN -RRB-_-RRB- originally_RB proposed_VBN by_IN Breiman_NNP -LRB-_-LRB- 1996_CD -RRB-_-RRB- ._.

In_IN 1997_CD ,_, the_DT International_NNP Agency_NNP for_IN Research_NNP on_IN Cancer_NNP -LRB-_-LRB- IARC_NNP -RRB-_-RRB- classified_VBD TCDD_NNP as_IN a_DT Group_NNP I_NN carcinogen_NN on_IN the_DT basis_NN of_IN limited_JJ evidence_NN in_IN humans_NNS ,_, sufficient_JJ evidence_NN in_IN animals_NNS and_CC the_DT consideration_NN that_IN the_DT Ah_UH receptor_NN ,_, through_IN which_WDT dioxin_NN acts_NNS ,_, is_VBZ present_JJ in_IN both_DT humans_NNS and_CC animals_NNS ._.

The_DT Montreal_NNP Protocol_NNP allows_VBZ continued_VBN production_NN and_CC importation_NN of_IN CFCs_NNS in_IN developing_VBG countries_NNS until_IN 2010_CD to_TO facilitate_VB their_PRP$ transition_NN to_TO the_DT newer_JJR CFC_NNP free_JJ technologies_NNS

Background_NN Fluorocarbons_NNS are_VBP a_DT group_NN of_IN synthetic_JJ halogen-substituted_JJ methane_NN and_CC ethane_NN derivatives_NNS containing_VBG atoms_NNS of_IN chlorine_NN and_CC fluorine_NN and_CC are_VBP commonly_RB known_VBN as_IN chlorofluorocarbons_NNS -LRB-_-LRB- CFCs_NNP -RRB-_-RRB- ._. 
They_PRP are_VBP generally_RB known_VBN by_IN commercial_JJ names_NNS such_JJ as_IN freon_NN ,_, arcton_NN and_CC frigen_NN ._. 
Since_IN the_DT 1930s_NNS ,_, when_WRB chlorofluorocarbons_NNS -LRB-_-LRB- CFCs_NNP -RRB-_-RRB- ,_, fully_RB halogenated_VBN or_CC non-hydrogenated_JJ fluorocarbons_NNS ,_, were_VBD developed_VBN ,_, they_PRP were_VBD considered_VBN to_TO be_VB nearly_RB perfect_JJ chemicals_NNS ._. 
Until_IN now_RB ,_, there_EX have_VBP been_VBN few_JJ isolated_JJ reports_NNS of_IN cardiotoxicity_NN and_CC nephrotoxicity_NN resulting_VBG from_IN occupational_JJ exposure_NN to_TO different_JJ fluorocarbons_NNS ._. 
Despite_IN the_DT life-threatening_JJ cardiotoxic_JJ consequences_NNS of_IN fluorinated_VBN hydrocarbon_NN exposure_NN ,_, the_DT documentation_NN of_IN toxic_JJ effects_NNS in_IN human_JJ subjects_NNS is_VBZ still_RB ambiguous_JJ ._. 
Thus_RB ,_, this_DT study_NN was_VBD conducted_VBN to_TO determine_VB the_DT occupational_JJ exposure_NN effects_NNS on_IN the_DT cardiovascular_JJ system_NN and_CC renal_JJ function_NN when_WRB exposed_VBN to_TO freon_NN ._. 
There_EX are_VBP several_JJ hypotheses_NNS on_IN the_DT mechanism_NN for_IN the_DT arrhythmogenic_JJ effect_NN of_IN hydrocarbons_NNS and_CC fluorocarbons_NNS including_VBG :_: the_DT effects_NNS on_IN the_DT central_JJ nervous_JJ system_NN ,_, respiratory_JJ reflexes_NNS ,_, changes_NNS in_IN potassium_NN levels_NNS ,_, or_CC either_CC the_DT adrenergic_JJ and\/or_CC cholinergic_JJ receptors_NNS ;_: the_DT direct_JJ effects_NNS on_IN the_DT cardiac_JJ conduction_NN system_NN ;_: or_CC the_DT sensitizing_NN of_IN the_DT heart_NN to_TO the_DT endogenous_JJ catecholamines_NNS 
Furthermore_RB ,_, the_DT arrhythmogenicity_NN of_IN freon_NN on_IN the_DT heart_NN conduction_NN system_NN is_VBZ enhanced_VBN synergistically_RB by_IN hypoxia_NN 
Since_IN the_DT 1930s_NNS ,_, when_WRB chlorofluorocarbons_NNS -LRB-_-LRB- CFCs_NNP -RRB-_-RRB- ,_, fully_RB halogenated_VBN or_CC non-hydrogenated_JJ fluorocarbons_NNS ,_, were_VBD developed_VBN ,_, they_PRP were_VBD considered_VBN to_TO be_VB nearly_RB perfect_JJ chemicals_NNS ._. 
They_PRP are_VBP stable_JJ ,_, nonflammable_JJ ,_, noncorrosive_JJ ,_, low_JJ in_IN toxicity_NN and_CC inexpensive_JJ to_TO produce_VB ._. 
In_IN 1974_CD ,_, scientists_NNS discovered_VBD that_IN CFCs_NNP have_VBP the_DT capability_NN of_IN depleting_VBG the_DT stratospheric_JJ ozone_NN layer_NN ._. 
Table_NNP 3_NNP illustrates_VBZ that_IN the_DT average_JJ concentrations_NNS of_IN freon_NN 12_CD and_CC 22_CD in_IN the_DT breathing_NN zone_NN of_IN refrigeration_NN workers_NNS were_VBD 5720_CD mg\/m_NN 3_CD and_CC 4310_CD mg\/m_NN 3_CD respectively_RB ,_, which_WDT exceed_VBP threshold_NN limit_NN values_NNS ,_, which_WDT are_VBP 4950_CD mg\/m_NN 3_CD and_CC 3540_CD mg\/m_NN 3_CD respectively_RB ._.

In_IN 1974_CD ,_, scientists_NNS discovered_VBD that_IN CFCs_NNP have_VBP the_DT capability_NN of_IN depleting_VBG the_DT stratospheric_JJ ozone_NN layer_NN ._.

Discussion_NN In_IN this_DT paper_NN we_PRP report_VBP the_DT first_JJ data_NNS on_IN specific_JJ biomarkers_NNS of_IN autoimmune_JJ dysfunction_NN in_IN persons_NNS exposed_VBN to_TO inorganic_JJ mercury_NN or_CC methylmercury_NN ._.
